mapper.select: select t.MODULE_CODE "id",t.MODULE_NAME "name" from DW_NEWQUERY_MODULE_TYPE t order by to_number(t.ORD)
select t.MODULE_NAME,t.MODULE_CODE from V_DW_NEWQUERY_LOG_URL t where t.URL=#{markName}
select t.KPI_FULL_NAME "KPI_NAME",case t.LABEL_TYPE when 'D' then '1' when 'M' then '2' else '其他' end LABEL_TYPE from DMCODE_PUB.DMCODE_COMP_KPI_MAPPING t where t.KPI_CODE=#{kpiCode}
select t.SUBJECT_NAME,t.LABEL_TYPE from DW_NEWQUERY_SUBJECT t where t.SUBJECT_CODE=#{subjectCode}
select t.FILENAME from DW_NEWQUERY_REPORT t where t.ID=#{reportCode}

select t.USER_ID,t.K_AUTHORITY,t.T_AUTHORITY,t.R_AUTHORITY from USER_AUTHORITY t where 1 = 1
and t.USER_ID=#{userId}

select upper(k.BM) BM,k.LY,k.CON,k.RN,k.MARKNAME,j.KPI_FULL_NAME KS_NAME,case j.LABEL_TYPE when 'D' then '1' when 'M' then '2' else '其他' end LABEL_TYPE from ( select * from (SELECT T.*, rank() over(partition by BM order by LY desc, CON desc, VALAUS desc) RN from (select MARKCODE BM, 1 LY, VALAUS, 0 CON, MARKNAME from DM.MANU_BOOSTING_CODE where MARKNAME in ('indexdetails') UNION ALL select SPECIFICMARK BM,0 LY,0 VALAUS,count(SPECIFICMARK) CON,MARKNAME from DM.DW3_ES_BASE_2 where MARKNAME in ('indexdetails') group by SPECIFICMARK, MARKNAME) T order by LY desc, VALAUS desc, CON desc) WHERE RN = 1 )k left join DMCODE_PUB.DMCODE_COMP_KPI_MAPPING j on upper(k.BM)=j.KPI_CODE order by LY desc

select upper(k.BM) BM,k.LY,k.CON,k.RN,k.MARKNAME,j.SUBJECT_NAME KS_NAME, j.LABEL_TYPE from (select * from (select T.*, rank() over(partition by BM order by LY desc, CON desc, VALAUS desc) RN from (select MARKCODE BM, 1 LY, VALAUS, 0 CON,MARKNAME from DM.MANU_BOOSTING_CODE where MARKNAME in ('specialreport','thememonthcheck') UNION ALL select SPECIFICMARK BM,0 LY,0 VALAUS,count(SPECIFICMARK) CON,MARKNAME from DM.DW3_ES_BASE_2 where MARKNAME in ('specialreport','thememonthcheck') group by SPECIFICMARK, MARKNAME) T order by LY desc, VALAUS desc, CON desc) WHERE RN = 1) k left join DW_NEWQUERY_SUBJECT j on upper(k.BM)=j.SUBJECT_CODE order by LY desc

select count(SPECIFICMARK) WEEKCOUNT,DEPTID from DM.DW3_ES_BASE_2 where CLICKDATE between (select max(CLICKDATE) from DM.DW3_ES_BASE_2) - 6 and (select max(CLICKDATE) from DM.DW3_ES_BASE_2)
and USERID=#{userId}
and MARKNAME in ('indexdetails','specialreport','thememonthcheck')
and MARKNAME = 'indexdetails'
and MARKNAME in ('specialreport','thememonthcheck')
group by DEPTID

select * from DM.DW3_LOGS_STATISTIC_BY_DEPT where 1 = 1
and DEPT_ID=#{deptId}
and INDEX_TYPE = 'ALL'
and INDEX_TYPE = 'indexdetails'
and INDEX_TYPE = 'subject'

select BM,CON,MARKNAME,KSNAME,MARKTYPE,DATASOURCE,IS_MINUS, case ACCT_TYPE when 'D' then '日' when 'M' then '月' when '1' then '日' when '2' then '月' else ACCT_TYPE end ACCT_TYPE, case UNIT when '%' then '1' when '-' then '-' else '0' end IS_PERCENTAGE from ( select * from ( select upper(BM) BM,CON,MARKNAME, case MARKNAME when 'indexdetails' then KPI_FULL_NAME when 'specialreport' then SUBJECT_NAME when 'thememonthcheck' then SUBJECT_NAME end KSNAME, case MARKNAME when 'indexdetails' then '1' when 'specialreport' then '2' when 'thememonthcheck' then '2' end MARKTYPE, 'ORA' DATASOURCE, case MARKNAME when 'indexdetails' then IS_MINUS when 'specialreport' then '-' when 'thememonthcheck' then '-' end IS_MINUS, case MARKNAME when 'indexdetails' then k.LABEL_TYPE when 'specialreport' then s.LABEL_TYPE when 'thememonthcheck' then s.LABEL_TYPE end ACCT_TYPE, case MARKNAME when 'indexdetails' then UNIT when 'specialreport' then '-' when 'thememonthcheck' then '-' end UNIT from (select SPECIFICMARK BM, count(SPECIFICMARK) CON, MARKNAME from (SELECT b.* FROM ( SELECT MAX(TIMESTAMPS) TIMESTAMPS FROM DM.DW3_MISSION_UPDATE WHERE DATA_NAME LIKE 'dw3_es_base_2' and DATA_TYPE = 101) a, ( SELECT * FROM DM.DW3_ES_BASE_2 ) b where a.TIMESTAMPS = b.UPDATE_TIME) where 1 = 1
and MARKNAME in ('indexdetails','specialreport','thememonthcheck')
and MARKNAME = 'indexdetails'
and MARKNAME in ('specialreport','thememonthcheck')
and DEPTID=#{deptId}
group by SPECIFICMARK, MARKNAME order by CON desc) t left join DMCODE_PUB.DMCODE_COMP_KPI_MAPPING k on upper(t.BM) = KPI_CODE left join DW_NEWQUERY_SUBJECT s on upper(t.BM) = SUBJECT_CODE order by CON desc) where rownum <= 8 )
